description: Chance of getting a pair (2 to aces), 2 jacks, 2 queens, 2 kings, 2 aces, 2 pair, 3 of a kind, straight, flush, full house in 5-card poker is 1 in a(n), according to M. Barron.
references: Mike Barron, A Professional Gambler Tells How to Win, Belmont Books, page 44.
J. Scarne, Scarne's Complete Guide to Gambling, Simon and Schuster, 1961, p. 582.
links: Index entries for sequences related to poker
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
